pageContext.claim: “There is a cooling, and there's a heating -- I mean, look, it used to not be 'climate change,' it used to be 'global warming,' right? That wasn't working too well, 'cause it was getting too cold all over the place.”
pageContext.analysis: The earth is not getting colder. In fact, NASA scientists said that 2017 was the second warmest year since 1980.
